channel.title: October 5B give away and party hat giveaway!
channel.description:
Sponsored by Dragon Dyce.
Giveaway: Time/Date: October 1'st. 10AM EST. Location: W2 Spirit tree
We also give away a party hat each month, and this month we are doing things different Before the drop party one host will be given a red party hat and we will all go in the red portal at clan wars. It's going to be a great time.
Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/user/DragonDyce ---> Watch the video on the page, highest bet EVER in runescape with 20b pot. Website: http://www.dragondyce.com/

item.title: October 5B give away and party hat giveaway!

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I wonder how many times I need to tell you to stop making new threads for your stupid drop parties??? I’m not even going to merge this one. Update your old one.

item.title: October 5B give away and party hat giveaway!
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

What are the chances of you getting an item worth a lot?
Last 2 drop parties were complete wastes of time… 1000+ people in a tiny area who all want something. He only gives out I think 2 inventories full of shit.
